taskDefinition.name: Github Organization Repo Create
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: This handler allows you to create a repository to a organization you have access to on Github.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.name: org_name
parameter.description: The organisation name you wish to create a repositiory in (This will override the info value).

parameter.label: Repo Visibility
parameter.tooltip: options are private or public. default: public.

parameter.label: name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the existing repository you wish to create.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: Description of the existing repository you wish to create.
